concept.title: Updating documents
concept.shortdesc: Documents can be updated in place by one of two methods: Replace and Upsert.

conbody.p: Replace() will replace an existing document within Couchbase, failing if it doesn’t exist and Upsert() will replace an existing document, creating it if doesn’t exist.
Note that if the document didn’t already exist, on line 55, the Replace call would fail and the results printed on lines 61 and 62 would not be “Tom” and “Finnigan”
